title: Marketplace for Tuesday, July 9, 2013
teaser: LIBOR is back in the headlines. Do we really have to care? (The answer is 'yes', and we'll tell you why). Also, the Twinkie is back. The new owners of the Hostess company has started to manufacture the pastry again, but with fewer operating costs. What's the economic recipe for the new Twinkie?
description: LIBOR is back in the headlines. Do we really have to care? (The answer is 'yes', and we'll tell you why). Also, the Twinkie is back. The new owners of the Hostess company has started to manufacture the pastry again, but with fewer operating costs. What's the economic recipe for the new Twinkie?
byline: Shannon Mullen, Sabri Ben-Achour, Kai Ryssdal, David Weinberg, John Laurenson, Amy Kiley and Daryl Paranada
